entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 07 March 2023
